effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 384,923 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 180,452.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 76 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 382 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
